question: Which among the following is correct ?
option1: Except the buffer zones there is no Biotic interference in National Park, Biosphere Reserve & Sanctuary
option2: Except the buffer zones there is no Biotic interference in National Park & Biosphere Reserve
option3: Except the buffer zones there is no Biotic interference in National Park only
answer: Except the buffer zones there is no Biotic interference in National Park & Biosphere Reserve
explanation: Use of multiple lands is permissible in Biosphere Reserve. A biosphere is totally ecosystem-oriented and the boundaries are defined by legislation; and except the buffer zones there is no Biotic interference in National Park & Biosphere Reserve.
